resources.string: The Demonstration Service is demonstrating your sevice.
The service is not available to do this.
This activity is won\'t risk doing this. There may be outstanding permissions.
The service won\'t risk doing this. There may be outstanding permissions.
The demonstration service has been created.
The demonstration service has been destroyed.
This app manages an ongoing Service that runs with a notification to help Android prioritise it highly enough to keep it operational in the background.

This app demonstrates how to implement a long-running background Service, and how to bind to it safely from your Activities.
